channel.title: Maths on Cloud Nine
channel.description: Recent content in Maths on Cloud Nine

item.title: Smith, Keynes, and Penrose [draft]
item.description: What do Adam Smith, John Maynard Keynes, and Roger Penrose have in common? Well, certainly there must have been something, but it wasn't the content of their books. Smith and Keynes were economists, Penrose is a mathematical physicist. Still, I've mentioned them here together because in a way I'm telling a story and Roger Penrose's book is to me right now in some ways what Keynes's book once was. Let's start with me and Adam Smith.
